com.vmware.esx.settings.clusters.software

Interface Drafts

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, DraftsTypes, com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DraftsStub

    public interface Drafts
extends com.vmware.vapi.bindings.Service, DraftsTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Drafts interface provides methods to manage working copy of software documents.

    • Method Detail

      • commit

        Drafts.CommitInvocation commit(java.lang.String cluster,
                               java.lang.String draft,
                               DraftsTypes.CommitSpec spec)
        Commits the specified draft as the desired state document. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} where the task-id is the response of this operation.

        Invocation Result:
        Identifier of the commit. The return value will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.commit.

        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        draft - Identifier of the draft. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        spec - The spec to be used to create the commit.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.CommitInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described commit operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        NotAllowedInCurrentState - If there is another operation in progress.
        InvalidArgument - If validation of the software document fails. The value of the data property of Error will be a class that contains all the properties defined in DraftsTypes.ValidateResult.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.

      • create

        Drafts.CreateInvocation create(java.lang.String cluster)
        Creates a new software draft from the desired document. It will be deleted, when the draft is committed successfully. If a desired document is missing, then this method will create an empty draft.

        Invocation Result:
        Identifier of the working copy of the document. The return value will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.

        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.CreateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described create operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        AlreadyExists - If there is already a draft created by this user.
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.

      • delete

        Drafts.DeleteInvocation delete(java.lang.String cluster,
                               java.lang.String draft)
        Deletes the software draft.

        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.DeleteInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described delete operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft in the system.

        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.

      • list

        Drafts.ListInvocation list(java.lang.String cluster)
        Returns information about the software drafts for the specified cluster that match the DraftsTypes.FilterSpec.

        Invocation Result:
        Map of software drafts keyed by their identifiers. The key in the return value Map will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.

        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Read.

        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ValidateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described validate operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:

      • scan

        Drafts.ScanInvocation scan(java.lang.String cluster,
                           java.lang.String draft)
        Scans all the hosts in the cluster against the software draft. The result of this operation can be queried by calling the cis/tasks/{task-id} where the task-id is the response of this operation.

        Invocation Result:
        Result of scan operation.

        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        draft - Identifier of the working copy of the document. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ScanInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described scan operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster or no draft associated with draft in the system.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthenticated - If the caller is not authenticated.

      • importSoftwareSpec

        Drafts.ImportSoftwareSpecInvocation importSoftwareSpec(java.lang.String cluster,
                                                       DraftsTypes.ImportSpec spec)
        Imports the desired software specification as a new draft. If a desired document is missing, then this method will create an empty draft except when the source type is of either DraftsTypes.SourceType.LATEST_RECOMMENDATION or DraftsTypes.SourceType.CURRENT_SERIES_RECOMMENDATION, then NotFound error is reported. In addition, the exisiting draft will be overwritten when the source type is of either LATEST_RECOMMENDATION or CURRENT_SERIES_RECOMMENDATION.

        Invocation Result:
        Identifier of the software draft. The return value will be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.esx.settings.draft.

        Parameters:
        cluster - Identifier of the cluster. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: ClusterComputeResource.
        spec - Specification to import desired software specification.
        Returns:
        instance of Drafts.ImportSoftwareSpecInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described importSoftwareSpec operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
        Throws:
        Error - If there is unknown internal error. The accompanying error message will give more details about the failure.
        NotFound - If there is no cluster associated with cluster in the system or if the source type of import specification is of either LATEST_RECOMMENDATION or CURRENT_SERIES_RECOMMENDATION, and a recommendation does not exist for the cluster. It was either never generated or deleted due to changes in cluster state such as a new desired image spec being committed.
        ServiceUnavailable - If the service is not available.
        Unauthorized - if you do not have all of the privileges described as follows:
        • Method execution requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
        • The resource ClusterComputeResource referenced by the parameter cluster requires VcIntegrity.lifecycleSoftwareSpecification.Write.
